member.name: M:AClassLibrary.LivingPerson.#ctor
member.summary:
Returns a new instance of the class LivingPerson
and initializes its Age property to 0.

member.name: M:AClassLibrary.LivingPerson.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Returns a new instance of the class LivingPerson.
AgeException thrown if Age is set to a value below 0 or a value above 120.
member.param: Initial age of the LivingPerson instance

member.name: P:AClassLibrary.LivingPerson.Age
member.summary:
Gets or sets the age of the LivingPerson instance.
AgeException thrown if Age is set to a value below 0 or a value above 120.
